function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of ventilators, ICUs, and PPE in hospitals","Impact":"Inability to manage COVID-19 patients, leading to increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Increase production of ventilators, ICUs, and PPE, and distribute them strategically","Technologies":"Advanced manufacturing technologies for rapid production","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Massive increase in network bandwidth consumption","Impact":"Strain on telecommunications infrastructure, potential service disruptions","Mitigation":"Invest in network capacity expansion and optimization, implement traffic management measures","Technologies":"Network capacity scaling technologies, traffic shaping algorithms","People":"Telecommunication service providers, internet service providers","Owner":"Telecommunication service providers, internet service providers"},{"Description":"Massive drop in share prices of telecommunications companies","Impact":"Financial instability, potential layoffs, service quality reduction","Mitigation":"Explore cost-cutting measures, diversify revenue streams, consider government support","Technologies":"Financial planning and analysis tools, revenue diversification strategies","People":"Employees, shareholders, customers","Owner":"Telecommunication service providers, shareholders"}]}
